definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: The thirsty wayfarer was glad to find a fresh spring near the road.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的徒步旅行者很高興在路邊找到新鮮的泉水。

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天氣裏，徒步旅行甚是愜意。

sentences.english: Shau Kei Wan is a good place to get supplies for the hike.
sentences.chinese: 筲箕灣是徒步旅行的好地方。

sentences.english: We are planning to take a long hike on Saturday. Are you up for it?
sentences.chinese: 星期六我們計劃來次很長的徒步旅行。要去嗎？

sentences.english: She was underdressed for the hiking trip and suffered hypothermia.
sentences.chinese: 她徒步旅行時穿得有些薄弱，因此以爲渾身發冷。

sentences.english: And poking around in ruins would never be quite the same enjoyable pastime.
sentences.chinese: 再到廢墟中徒步旅行時就不會象過去一樣悠然自得。

sentences.english: Italian manufacturer of hiking and mountaineering footwear.
sentences.chinese: 意大利製造商的徒步旅行和登山鞋。

sentences.english: My one big exception is my hiking and backpacking gear.
sentences.chinese: 我的一個最大的例外是我的徒步旅行揹包裝備。

sentences.english: Not to hike Tom,who is still weak.
sentences.chinese: 別帶湯姆去徒步旅行，他的身體還很虛弱。

sentences.english: And we are going to be doing a lot of hiking in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 我們會在叢林裏做許多徒步旅行。

sentences.english: Inland, Ma On Shan County Park is a hiker's dream.
sentences.chinese: 在陸上，馬鞍山縣立公園是徒步旅行者夢想的地方。

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行環遊世界一週。

sentences.english: For hiking women wear shoes of stout leather with heavy soles and flat heels.
sentences.chinese: 婦女徒步旅行時穿結實的厚底平跟皮鞋。

sentences.english: This is a hiking trail made out of an ancient road trail.
sentences.chinese: 這是一條由古路形成的徒步旅行線路。

sentences.english: I like traveling on foot With my brother in holidays.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在假期跟哥哥一起徒步旅行。

definition: to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
